name: Splash Damage
detail: Splash Damage Ltd. is a British video game developer that specializes in multiplayer first-person shooter video games. The studio is best known as the creator of the Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory and Enemy Territory: Quake Wars.

works.name: Gears Tactics / 战争机器：战略版
Halo: The Master Chief Collection / 光环：士官长合辑
